name: RECONCILE_CLAIM_STATUS
description: This table contains claim-level status code information for claims reconciliation.

columns.name: CLAIM_RECON_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CLM_STAT_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Claim level status code received in a reconciliation file if value matches codes in the current claim status code category.
entries: For more detailed information, see remittance advice.

This is a subsequent request for information from the original request.

Claim may be reconsidered at a future date.

columns.name: CLM_STAT_DATA
columns.description: Claim level status code received in a reconciliation file. Set only if the value does not match a category abbreviation in the current claim status code category.

columns.name: CLM_CAT_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Claim level category code received in a reconciliation file if value matches codes in the claim status category code category.
entries: Acknowledgement/Forwarded-The claim has been forwarded to another entity.
Acknowledgement/Receipt-Claim has been received. Not accepted for adjudication
Acknowledgement/Not Found-Claim can not be found in the adjudication system.
Acknowledgement/Split Claim-Claim split upon acceptance into adjudication system
Acknowledgement/Rejected for Missing Info - Missing info specified in Status
Acknowledgement/Rejected for Invalid Info - Specified in the Status details
Pending/In Process-The claim or encounter is in the adjudication system.
Pending/In Review-The claim/encounter is suspended pending review.
Pending/Requested Information-Claim is waiting for info already requested
Finalized-Claim completed adjudication cycle - no more action will be taken.
Finalized/Revised - Adjudication information has been changed
Finalized/Forwarded-Any applicable payment made - claim has been forwarded
Finalized/Not Forwarded-Any applicable payment made. Claim NOT forwarded
Request for additional info/more specific detail- Info received was inadequate
Response not possible - error on submitted request data
Information Holder is not responding; resubmit at a later time.
Entity not found - change search criteria

columns.name: CLM_CAT_CODE_DATA
columns.description: Claim level category code received in a reconciliation file. Set only if the value does not match a category abbreviation in the claim status category code category.

columns.name: CLM_MAPPED_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description: Mapped action for the status code.

columns.name: CLM_ACT_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Claim level action code received in a reconciliation file if value matches codes in the claim action category.

columns.name: CLM_ACT_CODE_DATA
columns.description: The claim level action code received in a reconciliation file. It is set when the value received in the file does not match any category abbreviation in the claim action category.

columns.name: CLM_ENTITY_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Claim level entity code received in a reconciliation file. Set only if the received value matches a category abbreviation in the claim entity code category.

columns.name: CLM_ENTITY_DATA
columns.description: Claim level entity code received in a reconciliation file. Set only if the value does not match a category abbreviation in the claim entity code category.

columns.name: CLM_INFO_REQ_CODE
columns.description: Code that defines additional information being requested.

columns.description: Claim level status message received in a reconciliation file.

columns.description: Implementation acknowledgment code received in a Healthcare Acknowledgment (999) file.
